AND b.board_type !='cb102'
ORDER BY b.board_index

SELECT me.member_no, me.cafe_no, me.user_no, me.notice_flag, me.member_nickname, me.cafe_member_grade_no, mg.member_grade_code, mg.grade_name, me.member_status_code, me.favorite_flag, me.visit_count, me.reg_date, me.post_count, me.reply_count FROM cafe_member me, cafe_member_grade mg WHERE (me.cafe_member_grade_no = mg.cafe_member_grade_no ) AND me.user_no = #{userNo} AND me.cafe_no = #{cafeNo} AND me.member_status_code not in('cs102')

SELECT event_type , count(*) counts FROM event_log WHERE reg_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'yyyymmdd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate},'yyyymmdd')+ 0.99999 AND event_cafe_no = #{cafeNo} GROUP BY event_type ORDER BY event_type
SELECT count(*) counts , to_char(reg_date,'yyyyMMdd') reg_date FROM event_log WHERE reg_date > to_date(#{endDate},'yyyyMMdd')-10 AND event_type='et100' AND event_cafe_no = #{cafeNo} GROUP BY reg_date

INSERT INTO board(board_no,cafe_no,cafe_url,board_name,access_grade,board_index,private_flag,board_type,board_detail,best_like_count,best_term,best_post_count) SELECT SEQ_BOARD_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, A.* from(
SELECT #{item.cafeNo} as cafe_no, #{item.cafeURL} as cafe_URL, #{item.boardName} as board_name, #{item.accessGrade} as access_grade, #{item.boardIndex} as board_index, #{item.privateFlag} as private_flag, #{item.boardType} as board_type, #{item.boardDetail:VARCHAR} as board_detail, #{item.bestLikeCount:NUMERIC} as best_like_count, #{item.bestTerm:CHAR} as best_term, #{item.bestPostCount:NUMERIC} as best_post_count FROM dual )A

update.foreach: UPDATE board SET board_name = #{item.boardName:VARCHAR}, access_grade = #{item.accessGrade:VARCHAR}, board_index = #{item.boardIndex:NUMERIC}, private_flag = #{item.privateFlag:CHAR}, board_detail = #{item.boardDetail:VARCHAR}, best_like_count = #{item.bestLikeCount:NUMERIC}, best_term = #{item.bestTerm:CHAR}, best_post_count = #{item.bestPostCount:NUMERIC} WHERE board_no = #{item.boardNo}
